attributes.action: join up with the civilsed parts of the EU and sign the Schengen Agreement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's high time our government started treating UK Citizens as Subjects and NOT 'suspects' and sign up to the Schengen Agreement on open borders with other EU members.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
